details.sectionContent: This workshop will teach you how to build your own smartphone controlled robot

In this workshop participants will be taught how to make a robot, which can be controlled using a smartphone. This will be made possible by using a bluetooth module in the robot to connect to bluetooth of your smartphone.

This workshop involves the creation of a robot which can be controlled by gestures done from your smartphone. It also helps participants to understand the underlying concepts and use of Arduino, BT module and Gyroscope module.

Students will gain practical hands on experience with the following components.
